title: Mathematics Grade 9
subject: Mathematics
description: Comprehensive mathematics textbook covering algebra, geometry, and number theory for grade 9 students.
descriptionAm: የአልጀብራ፣ የጂኦሜትሪ እና የቁጥር ንድፈ ሃሳብን ያካተተ አጠቃላይ የሂሳብ መማሪያ መጽሐፍ።

title: Physics Grade 9
subject: Physics
description: Introduction to physics principles including mechanics, energy, and motion.
descriptionAm: ሜካኒክስ፣ ሃይል እና እንቅስቃሴን ጨምሮ የፊዚክስ መርሆዎች መግቢያ።

title: Chemistry Grade 9
subject: Chemistry
description: Basic chemistry concepts, atomic structure, and chemical reactions.
descriptionAm: መሰረታዊ የኬሚስትሪ ጽንሰ-ሀሳቦች፣ የአቶሚክ መዋቅር እና የኬሚካል ምላሾች።

title: Biology Grade 9
subject: Biology
description: Study of living organisms, cells, and basic biological processes.
descriptionAm: የሕይወት አካላት፣ ሴሎች እና መሰረታዊ የባዮሎጂካል ሂደቶች ጥናት።

title: English Grade 9
subject: English
description: English language textbook focusing on grammar, literature, and communication skills.
descriptionAm: በሰዋሰው፣ ስነ-ጽሁፍ እና የመገናኛ ክህሎቶች ላይ ያተኮረ የእንግሊዝኛ መማሪያ።

title: Mathematics Grade 10
subject: Mathematics
description: Advanced mathematics including trigonometry, calculus basics, and statistics.
descriptionAm: ትሪጎኖሜትሪን፣ የካልኩለስ መሰረቶችን እና ስታትስቲክስን ያካተተ የላቀ ሂሳብ።

title: Physics Grade 10
subject: Physics
description: Intermediate physics covering electricity, magnetism, and wave motion.
descriptionAm: ኤሌክትሪክን፣ መግነጢስን እና የሞገድ እንቅስቃሴን የሚሸፍን መካከለኛ ፊዚክስ።

title: History Grade 10
subject: History
description: Ethiopian and world history covering major historical events and civilizations.
descriptionAm: ዋና ዋና ታሪካዊ ክስተቶችን እና ስልጣኔዎችን የሚሸፍን የኢትዮጵያ እና የአለም ታሪክ።

title: Mathematics Grade 11
subject: Mathematics
description: Advanced calculus, analytical geometry, and mathematical modeling.
descriptionAm: የላቀ ካልኩለስ፣ የትንታኔ ጂኦሜትሪ እና የሂሳብ ሞዴሊንግ።

title: Chemistry Grade 11
subject: Chemistry
description: Organic chemistry, chemical bonding, and laboratory techniques.
descriptionAm: ኦርጋኒክ ኬሚስትሪ፣ የኬሚካል ትስስር እና የላብራቶሪ ቴክኒኮች።

title: Physics Grade 11
subject: Physics
description: Advanced physics including thermodynamics, optics, and modern physics.
descriptionAm: ቴርሞዳይናሚክስን፣ ኦፕቲክስን እና ዘመናዊ ፊዚክስን ያካተተ የላቀ ፊዚክስ።

title: Biology Grade 11
subject: Biology
description: Advanced biology covering genetics, evolution, and ecology.
descriptionAm: ጄኔቲክስን፣ ዝግመተ ለውጥን እና ስነ-ምህዳርን የሚሸፍን የላቀ ባዮሎጂ።

title: Mathematics Grade 12
subject: Mathematics
description: University preparation mathematics including advanced calculus and linear algebra.
descriptionAm: የላቀ ካልኩለስ እና የመስመር አልጀብራን ጨምሮ የዩኒቨርሲቲ ዝግጅት ሂሳብ።

title: Physics Grade 12
subject: Physics
description: University preparation physics covering quantum mechanics and relativity.
descriptionAm: ኳንተም ሜካኒክስ እና አንጻራዊነትን የሚሸፍን የዩኒቨርሲቲ ዝግጅት ፊዚክስ።

title: Chemistry Grade 12
subject: Chemistry
description: Advanced chemistry preparing students for university-level studies.
descriptionAm: ተማሪዎችን ለዩኒቨርሲቲ ደረጃ ትምህርት የሚያዘጋጅ የላቀ ኬሚስትሪ።

title: Civics Grade 12
subject: Civics
description: Citizenship education covering governance, rights, and responsibilities.
descriptionAm: አስተዳደርን፣ መብቶችን እና ኃላፊነቶችን የሚሸፍን የዜግነት ትምህርት።
